title: China Ascent Exposes Its Achilles Heel
itunes:title: China Ascent Exposes Its Achilles Heel
description:
Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne explains why China is about to get old before it gets rich. LIFARS CEO Ondrej Krehel shares his thoughts on the Colonial Pipeline hack. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Bond and FX Reporter Liz McCormick talk about women getting top jobs at funds, just not the ones that manage money. Dr. Bruce Farber, Chief of Infectious Diseases at Northwell Health, discusses concerns that the U.S. has undercounted Covid-19 deaths. And we Drive to the Close with Steve Brown, Senior Portfolio Manager at American Century Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
